entry.title: 标签
entry.content: 1234567#include<stdio.h>int main(){printf("hello world!\n");return 1;} 1234567891011121314151617//核心动画 CGRect rect = CGRectMake(50, 100, 100, 100); CAShapeLayer * shapeLayer = [CAShapeLayer layer]; shapeLayer.frame = rect; shapeLayer.strokeColor = [[UIColor redColor] CGColor]; //圆形 //UIBezierPath * Bpath = [UIBezierPath bezierPathWithOvalInRect:rect]; //长方形 //UIBezierPath * Bpath = [UIBezierPath bezierPathWithRect:rect]; //圆角矩形 UIBezierPath * Bpath = [UIBezierPath bezierPathWithRoundedRect:rect cornerRadius:60]; //单独一个或几个角 //UIBezierPath * Bpath = [UIBezierPath bezierPathWithRoundedRect:rect byRoundingCorners:(UIRectCornerTopLeft) cornerRadii:(CGSize){ 50,50 }]; shapeLayer.path = Bpath.CGPath; [self.view.layer addSublayer:shapeLayer];
